statements: SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities;
SELECT activity_name, activity_date FROM suspicious_activities WHERE is_suspicious = TRUE;
SELECT activity_description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT id, activity_name, activity_date FROM suspicious_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01' AND activity_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE is_suspicious = true ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT activity_name, activity_description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT activity_name, activity_date FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_name ILIKE 'Fraud%' AND is_suspicious = true;
SELECT id, activity_name, activity_description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_name LIKE '%Account%' AND is_suspicious = true ORDER BY user_id, activity_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM SuspiciousActivities;
SELECT activity_id, user_id, activity_description FROM SuspiciousActivities WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT activity_id, user_id, activity_timestamp FROM SuspiciousActivities WHERE activity_timestamp > '2023-01-01';
SELECT activity_id, activity_description, activity_timestamp FROM SuspiciousActivities ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM AlertLogs JOIN SuspiciousActivities ON AlertLogs.activity_id = SuspiciousActivities.activity_id;
SELECT * FROM SuspiciousActivities WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT activity_id, activity_description FROM SuspiciousActivities WHERE activity_timestamp >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT log_id, activity_id, alert_message, alert_timestamp FROM AlertLogs WHERE alert_timestamp BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC;
SELECT activity_id, COUNT(*) AS num_alerts FROM AlertLogs GROUP BY activity_id HAVING num_alerts > 3 ORDER BY num_alerts DESC;
SELECT s.activity_id, s.user_id, a.alert_message FROM SuspiciousActivities s JOIN AlertLogs a ON s.activity_id = a.activity_id ORDER BY s.activity_timestamp DESC, a.alert_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities;
SELECT activity_name, activity_description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM alerts ORDER BY alert_datetime DESC;
SELECT alert_type, alert_message FROM alerts WHERE alert_id = 3;
SELECT log_message, log_date FROM monitoring_logs WHERE log_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_name = 'Hacking' ORDER BY activity_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT activity_name, activity_description FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2021-01-01' AND activity_date <= '2021-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT activity_name FROM suspicious_activities ORDER BY activity_name ASC
SELECT activity_name, COUNT(*) as activity_count FROM suspicious_activities GROUP BY activity_name HAVING activity_count > 5 ORDER BY activity_count DESC
SELECT activity_name, activity_description, activity_date FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_description LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY activity_date
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_info ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT log_id, alert_type, log_timestamp FROM alert_logs WHERE alert_type = 'Suspicious' LIMIT 10;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM monitoring_settings WHERE setting_name LIKE '%notification%';
SELECT activity_id, activity_description, activity_timestamp FROM suspicious_activities ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT activity_description, user_id FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_id > 100 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_info WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY last_login ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM alert_logs WHERE alert_type LIKE '%security%' AND log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM monitoring_settings WHERE setting_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY setting_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS login_attempts FROM login_attempts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT activity_description, activity_time FROM suspicious_activities WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, attempt_time, attempt_result FROM login_attempts WHERE attempt_result = 'FAILED' ORDER BY attempt_time ASC;
SELECT a.activity_id, a.user_id, a.activity_description, a.activity_time, al.log_details FROM suspicious_activities a INNER JOIN activity_logs al ON a.activity_id = al.activity_id;

SELECT u.username, a.activity_description, al.log_details FROM users u INNER JOIN suspicious_activities a ON u.user_id = a.user_id INNER JOIN activity_logs al ON a.activity_id = al.activity_id ORDER BY u.username ASC;
